attributes.comment:
Raising fees further for adoption is unfair and wrong. Families all over our
country already spend in excess of $10,000 to adopt children; quite a hefty sum
to enjoy parenthood, a blessing not equally bestowed on all, and often times on
those who don't seem to deserve it or appreciate it. If the government needs
more money, instead of upping adoption fees, why don't they stop handing out
money to people lucky enough to be fertile who are 'stocking' the earth with
more government dependent citizens?

Sincerely,
Wendy Escobedo, M.Ed., MBA

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Wendy L. Escobedo
